body:
PayPal
















Hello, PayPal member

	



 2007

TIP


Know Who You're Buying From


		Before you buy, click the link under the seller's email address on the Payment 
		Details page to see their account type and status, and length of time as a 
		PayPal member. 
		For more online safety tips, 
		visit our 
		Security Center.




Money Market Fund

		
		Earn a competitive rate on your PayPal balance – enroll in the PayPal 
		Money Market Fund. It's easy – 
		sign up 
		now




Share Your Story

		
		Do you have an extraordinary PayPal story? Send an email to 
		mystory@paypal.com and tell us all about it. You may 
		be featured in a future newsletter.



















Keep Your Money Safe
What to Know About Bank Security, Fees, and Interest
Given steeply 
		rising fees, are you paying too much for your bank account? Are you earning 
		enough on your balance? Are you protected against electronic fraud?

Be an informed consumer, and find out:


What you can do to protect your money.
What you are being charged.
How to earn a better yield on your accounts.

Learn what 
you need to know.














Add Your Bank Account – Instantly!


		When you link your bank and PayPal accounts, you can:


• 
Pay with PayPal using cash from your bank.


• 
Move money easily between accounts.


• 
Become a Verified PayPal member.


Find out 
	more















Transfer Money Easily Between Accounts

Once you connect your 
		bank account to your PayPal account, it's easy to transfer money between accounts:



1. 
Log in to your PayPal account.


2. 
Update the Account .


3. 
Select the account and transfer money.












 Special Offers for PayPal Users*



















Mother's Day Special
Take $10 off 
				any purchase of $49.99 or more. Use promo code PAYMOM at checkout.
				












$10 Off On $50 or More

				Up to 70% off bedding, fashion, bags, and shoes. Kate Spade and more. 
				Save $10 now.
				












Free Shipping
Find and 
				shop online with an eRepresentative and use coupon code PPAL.
